title: Guardian Angel
description: Guardian Angel is a full stack Rails application that will allow users to create an account and gain access to resources that can boost mental health and/or help in times of crisis. Users will be able to select from a list of emotions and feelings as many times per day as they wish. By accessing the ‘ThroughLine API’, a list of helpful resources will be returned to the user, including, but not limited to, phone numbers, sms hotlines, support groups, and relevant, helpful websites.

title: Chess with Frein-emies
description: ‘Chess With Frien-emies' is a full stack Rails application that will allow users to sign into a pre-made account and connect with their friends to play games of chess. The application also provides users with a functional friends list, and a section for statistics on their previous games of chess.
